verses.verse: וַיַּ֥עַן <WH6030> answered אִיּ֗וֹב <WH347> Then Job וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said
שָׁמַ֣עְתִּי <WH8085> I have heard כְאֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> such רַבּ֑וֹת <WH7227> many such things מְנַחֲמֵ֖י <WH5162> comforters עָמָ֣ל <WH5999> miserable כֻּלְּכֶֽם׃ <WH3605> all

הֲקֵ֥ץ <WH7093> is there limit לְדִבְרֵי־ <WH1697> words ר֑וּחַ <WH7307> Shall vain א֥וֹ <WH176> and מַה־ <WH4100> what יַּ֝מְרִֽיצְךָ֗ <WH4834> plagues כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תַעֲנֶֽה׃ <WH6030> thee that thou answerest

גַּ֤ם ׀ <WH1571> too אָנֹכִי֮ <WH595> I כָּכֶ֪ם אֲדַ֫בֵּ֥רָה <WH1696> I also could speak ל֤וּ־ <WH3863> as ye [do] if יֵ֪שׁ <WH3426> were נַפְשְׁכֶ֡ם <WH5315> your soul תַּ֤חַת <WH8478> your place נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> in my soul's אַחְבִּ֣ירָה <WH2266> stead I could heap up עֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <WH5921> against בְּמִלִּ֑ים <WH4405> words וְאָנִ֥יעָה <WH5128> against you and shake עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> against בְּמ֣וֹ <WH1119> at רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> mine head
אֲאַמִּצְכֶ֥ם <WH553> [But] I would strengthen בְּמוֹ־ <WH1119> you with פִ֑י <WH6310> my mouth וְנִ֖יד <WH5205> and the moving שְׂפָתַ֣י <WH8193> of my lips יַחְשֹֽׂךְ׃ <WH2820> should asswage

אִֽם־ <WH518> If אֲ֭דַבְּרָה <WH1696> Though I speak לֹא־ <WH3808> is not יֵחָשֵׂ֣ךְ <WH2820> is not asswaged כְּאֵבִ֑י <WH3511> my grief וְ֝אַחְדְּלָ֗ה <WH2308> and [though] I forbear מַה־ <WH4100> what מִנִּ֥י <WH4480> at יַהֲלֹֽךְ׃ <WH1980> what am I eased
אַךְ־ <WH389> but עַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> now הֶלְאָ֑נִי <WH3811> But now he hath made me weary הֲ֝שִׁמּ֗וֹתָ <WH8074> thou hast made desolate כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲדָתִֽי׃ <WH5712> all my company

וַֽ֭תִּקְמְטֵנִי <WH7059> And thou hast filled me with wrinkles לְעֵ֣ד <WH5707> [which] is a witness הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> has become וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> rising up בִּ֥י כַ֝חֲשִׁ֗י <WH3585> [against me] and my leanness בְּפָנַ֥י <WH6440> to my face יַעֲנֶֽה׃ <WH6030> in me beareth witness

אַפּ֤וֹ <WH639> [me] in his wrath טָרַ֨ף ׀ <WH2963> He teareth וַֽיִּשְׂטְמֵ֗נִי <WH7852> who hateth חָרַ֣ק <WH2786> me he gnasheth עָלַ֣י <WH5921> with בְּשִׁנָּ֑יו <WH8127> upon me with his teeth צָרִ֓י ׀ <WH6862> mine enemy יִלְט֖וֹשׁ <WH3913> sharpeneth עֵינָ֣יו <WH5869> his eyes לִֽי׃

פָּעֲר֬וּ <WH6473> They have gaped עָלַ֨י ׀ <WH5921> against בְּפִיהֶ֗ם <WH6310> upon me with their mouth בְּ֭חֶרְפָּה <WH2781> reproachfully הִכּ֣וּ <WH5221> they have smitten לְחָיָ֑י <WH3895> me upon the cheek יַ֝֗חַד <WH3162> themselves together עָלַ֥י <WH5921> against יִתְמַלָּאֽוּן׃ <WH4390> they have gathered

יַסְגִּירֵ֣נִי <WH5462> hath delivered אֵ֭ל <WH410> God אֶ֣ל <WH413> to עֲוִ֑יל <WH5760> me to the ungodly וְעַל־ <WH5921> into יְדֵ֖י <WH3027> into the hands רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> of the wicked יִרְטֵֽנִי׃ <WH3399> and turned me over

שָׁ֘לֵ֤ו <WH7961> I was at ease הָיִ֨יתִי ׀ <WH1961> become וַֽיְפַרְפְּרֵ֗נִי <WH6565> but he hath broken me asunder וְאָחַ֣ז <WH270> he hath also taken בְּ֭עָרְפִּי <WH6203> [me] by my neck וַֽיְפַצְפְּצֵ֑נִי <WH6327> and shaken me to pieces וַיְקִימֵ֥נִי <WH6965> and set me up ל֝֗וֹ לְמַטָּרָֽה׃ <WH4307> for his mark

יָ֘סֹ֤בּוּ <WH5437> compass me round about עָלַ֨י ׀ <WH5921> and רַבָּ֗יו <WH7228> His archers יְפַלַּ֣ח <WH6398> asunder כִּ֭לְיוֹתַי <WH3629> my reins וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> Without יַחְמ֑וֹל <WH2550> and doth not spare יִשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <WH8210> he poureth out לָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> upon the ground מְרֵרָֽתִי׃ <WH4845> my gall

יִפְרְצֵ֣נִי <WH6555> He breaketh פֶ֭רֶץ <WH6556> me with breach עַל־ <WH5921> up פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> upon פָ֑רֶץ <WH6556> breach יָרֻ֖ץ <WH7323> he runneth עָלַ֣י <WH5921> and כְּגִבּֽוֹר׃ <WH1368> upon me like a giant

שַׂ֣ק <WH8242> sackcloth תָּ֭פַרְתִּי <WH8609> I have sewed עֲלֵ֣י <WH5921> over גִלְדִּ֑י <WH1539> upon my skin וְעֹלַ֖לְתִּי <WH5953> and defiled בֶעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> in the dust קַרְנִֽי׃ <WH7161> my horn

פָּנַ֣י <WH6440> My face [חֳמַרְמְרָה כ] (חֳ֭מַרְמְרוּ <WH2560> daub ק) מִנִּי־ <WH4480> from בֶ֑כִי <WH1065> with weeping וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> is on עַפְעַפַּ֣י <WH6079> and on my eyelids צַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <WH6757> [is] the shadow of death
עַ֭ל <WH5921> Although לֹא־ <WH3808> is no חָמָ֣ס <WH2555> Not for [any] injustice בְּכַפָּ֑י <WH3709> in mine hands וּֽתְפִלָּתִ֥י <WH8605> also my prayer זַכָּֽה׃ <WH2134> [is] pure

אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> O earth אַל־ <WH408> and Let there be no תְּכַסִּ֣י <WH3680> cover דָמִ֑י <WH1818> not thou my blood וְֽאַל־ <WH408> and Let there be no יְהִ֥י <WH1961> become מָ֝ק֗וֹם <WH4725> have no place לְזַעֲקָתִֽי׃ <WH2201> and let my cry

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even עַ֭תָּה <WH6258> now הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold בַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> [is] in heaven עֵדִ֑י <WH5707> Also now behold my witness וְ֝שָׂהֲדִ֗י <WH7717> and my record בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃ <WH4791> [is] on high
מְלִיצַ֥י <WH3887> scorn רֵעָ֑י <WH7453> My friends אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱ֝ל֗וֹהַ <WH433> [tears] unto God דָּלְפָ֥ה <WH1811> poureth out עֵינִֽי׃ <WH5869> me [but] mine eye

וְיוֹכַ֣ח <WH3198> O that one might plead לְגֶ֣בֶר <WH1397> for a man עִם־ <WH5973> with אֱל֑וֹהַּ <WH433> with God וּֽבֶן־ <WH1121> afflicted אָדָ֥ם <WH120> as a man לְרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> his neighbor

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for שְׁנ֣וֹת <WH8141> years מִסְפָּ֣ר <WH4557> When a few יֶאֱתָ֑יוּ <WH857> are come וְאֹ֖רַח <WH734> the way לֹא־ <WH3808> of no אָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> [whence] I shall not return אֶהֱלֹֽךְ׃ <WH1980> then I shall go
